name: Increase Sunder Charm Drops
description: Customizable drop rates for Sunder Charms, plus options to add them to regular bosses and monsters.
author: Jobus

config.name: Terror Zone Droprate Multiplier
config.description: Multiplies the chance for Sunder Charms to drop in Terror Zones. Set to 1 for vanilla drop rates.

config.name: Add to Boss Loot Tables
config.description: Allows regular Hell bosses (Andariel, Duriel, etc) and some mini-bosses (Blood Raven, The Summoner, etc) to drop Sunder Charms outside of Terror Zones.

config.name: Boss Drop Weight
config.description:
The probability weight for regular Hell bosses to drop Sunder Charms. Higher = more frequent. 
Examples: 5 = ~20% chance. 0.5 = ~2.5% chance.

config.name: Add to Global Loot Tables
config.description: Allows ANY monster in Hell difficulty to drop Sunder Charms. WARNING: This dilutes the 'Unique Charm' pool, making Gheed's Fortune significantly rarer (~7x).

config.name: Equalize Elemental Ratios
config.description: Removes the rarity tiers between charms. Magic, Physical, and Poison charms will drop as frequently as Fire, Cold, and Lightning.
